name: Rocket Scope
description: Rocket Scope is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot with a classic box design and buttons. It has rocket-powered arms and legs, which allow it to move swiftly and perform complex maneuvers. Its screen is adorned with a cute cat graphic, adding a touch of whimsy to its appearance. To enhance its vision and perception, Rocket Scope is equipped with stylish glasses. This eccentric and high-tech robot is a proud member of the WebtrES club.
